message.content:
I need to identify the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the given financial statements.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see a line item specifically for this:
```
| Cash and Cash Equivalents |  | 2024-02-05 |
| Beginning Balance  | 20000000.00 | 2024-02-05 |
```

This clearly shows that the beginning balance of cash and cash equivalents was 20,000,000.00.

I can verify this by checking the balance sheet, which shows:
```
| Cash on Hand | 5000000.00 | 2023-12-31 | 1482632.85 | 2024-02-05 |
| Bank Deposits | 15000000.00 | 2023-12-31 | 1100000.00 | 2024-02-05 |
```

The sum of Cash on Hand (5,000,000.00) and Bank Deposits (15,000,000.00) at the initial date (2023-12-31) equals 20,000,000.00, which confirms the beginning balance of cash and cash equivalents.

{"solution": {'value': '20000000.00'}}
